org.jruyi.core

Interface ITcpServerConfiguration


  • public interface ITcpServerConfiguration
    This interface defines methods to configure a TCP server service.
    Since:
    2.2

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void apply()
      Applies this configuration to the associated TCP server service.
      java.lang.Integer backlog()
      Returns the maximum length of the queue of incoming connections or null if not configured.
      java.lang.String bindAddr()
      Returns the bound address or null if bound to ANY addresses.
      java.lang.Boolean keepAlive()
      Returns whether to set socket option SO_KEEPALIVE.
      ITcpServerConfiguration keepAlive(java.lang.Boolean keepAlive)
      Sets whether to set socket option SO_KEEPALIVE.
      java.lang.Boolean oobInline()
      Returns whether to enable OOBINLINE(receipt of TCP urgent data), or null if not configured.
      ITcpServerConfiguration oobInline(java.lang.Boolean oobInline)
      Sets whether to enable OOBINLINE(receipt of TCP urgent data).
      int[] performancePreferences()
      Returns the performance preferences(connection-time, latency and bandwidth in order) to set, or null if not configured.
      int port()
      Returns the port.
      java.lang.Integer recvBufSize()
      Returns the socket buffer size for receiving, or null if not configured.
      boolean reuseAddr()
      Returns whether to reuse addresses.
      java.lang.Integer sendBufSize()
      Returns the socket buffer size for sending, or null if not configured.
      ITcpServerConfiguration sendBufSize(java.lang.Integer sendBufSize)
      Sets the number of bytes used to set the socket option SO_SNDBUF.
      int sessionIdleTimeoutInSeconds()
      Returns the timeout in seconds for idle connections.
      ITcpServerConfiguration sessionIdleTimeoutInSeconds(int sessionIdleTimeoutInSeconds)
      Sets the timeout in seconds for idle connections.
      java.lang.Integer soLinger()
      Returns how many seconds to linger for as configured.
      ITcpServerConfiguration soLinger(java.lang.Integer soLinger)
      Sets the seconds to linger for.
      java.lang.Boolean tcpNoDelay()
      Returns whether to disable Nagle's Algorithm, or null if not configured
      ITcpServerConfiguration tcpNoDelay(java.lang.Boolean tcpNoDelay)
      Sets whether to disable Nagle's Algorithm.
      long throttle()
      Returns the throttle.
      ITcpServerConfiguration throttle(long throttle)
      Sets the throttle.
      java.lang.Integer trafficClass()
      Returns the traffic class or type-of-service octet to be set in the IP header, or null if not configured.
      ITcpServerConfiguration trafficClass(java.lang.Integer trafficClass)
      Sets the traffic class or type-of-service octet to be set in the IP header.

      • throttle

        ITcpServerConfiguration throttle(long throttle)
        Sets the throttle.
        Parameters:
        throttle - the throttle to set
        Returns:
        this configuration
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the specified throttle is less than -1

      • sessionIdleTimeoutInSeconds

        int sessionIdleTimeoutInSeconds()
        Returns the timeout in seconds for idle connections.
        Returns:
        the idle timeout in seconds

      • sessionIdleTimeoutInSeconds

        ITcpServerConfiguration sessionIdleTimeoutInSeconds(int sessionIdleTimeoutInSeconds)
        Sets the timeout in seconds for idle connections. Sets 0 to not allow idle connections. Sets -1 to never time out.
        Parameters:
        sessionIdleTimeoutInSeconds - the idle timeout in seconds to set
        Returns:
        this configuration
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the specified idleTimeoutInSeconds is less than -1

      • keepAlive

        java.lang.Boolean keepAlive()
        Returns whether to set socket option SO_KEEPALIVE.
        Returns:
        true if SO_KEEPALIVE will be set, false if will not, null if not set

      • keepAlive

        ITcpServerConfiguration keepAlive(java.lang.Boolean keepAlive)
        Sets whether to set socket option SO_KEEPALIVE. Sets null to not set the socket option SO_KEEPALIVE.
        Parameters:
        keepAlive - indicates whether to set socket option SO_KEEPALIVE
        Returns:
        this configuration

      • soLinger

        java.lang.Integer soLinger()
        Returns how many seconds to linger for as configured.
        Returns:
        seconds to linger for if configured

      • soLinger

        ITcpServerConfiguration soLinger(java.lang.Integer soLinger)
        Sets the seconds to linger for. Sets null to not set the socket option SO_LINGER. behavior.
        Parameters:
        soLinger - the seconds to linger for
        Returns:
        this configuration
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the specified soLinger is negative

      • sendBufSize

        java.lang.Integer sendBufSize()
        Returns the socket buffer size for sending, or null if not configured.
        Returns:
        the socket buffer size for sending

      • sendBufSize

        ITcpServerConfiguration sendBufSize(java.lang.Integer sendBufSize)
        Sets the number of bytes used to set the socket option SO_SNDBUF. Sets null to not set the socket option SO_SNDBUF.
        Parameters:
        sendBufSize - the maximum socket send buffer in bytes
        Returns:
        this configuration
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the specified sendBufSize is less than 1

      • tcpNoDelay

        java.lang.Boolean tcpNoDelay()
        Returns whether to disable Nagle's Algorithm, or null if not configured
        Returns:
        true if to disable Nagle's Algorithm, false if not to, or null if not configured

      • tcpNoDelay

        ITcpServerConfiguration tcpNoDelay(java.lang.Boolean tcpNoDelay)
        Sets whether to disable Nagle's Algorithm. Sets null to not configure.
        Parameters:
        tcpNoDelay - indicates whether to disable Nagle's Algorithm
        Returns:
        this configuration

      • trafficClass

        java.lang.Integer trafficClass()
        Returns the traffic class or type-of-service octet to be set in the IP header, or null if not configured.
        Returns:
        the traffic class or type-of-service octet

      • trafficClass

        ITcpServerConfiguration trafficClass(java.lang.Integer trafficClass)
        Sets the traffic class or type-of-service octet to be set in the IP header. Sets null to not configure.
        Parameters:
        trafficClass - the traffic class or type-of-service octet to be set in the IP header
        Returns:
        this configuration

      • oobInline

        java.lang.Boolean oobInline()
        Returns whether to enable OOBINLINE(receipt of TCP urgent data), or null if not configured.
        Returns:
        true if to enable OOBINLINE, false if not to, or null if not configured

      • oobInline

        ITcpServerConfiguration oobInline(java.lang.Boolean oobInline)
        Sets whether to enable OOBINLINE(receipt of TCP urgent data). Sets null to not configure.
        Parameters:
        oobInline - indicates whether to enable OOBINLINE
        Returns:
        this configuration

      • apply

        void apply()
           throws java.lang.Throwable
        Applies this configuration to the associated TCP server service.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Throwable - if any error happens
